scripts.stop-environment: docker-compose -f dev/environment/docker-compose.yml down --volumes && docker network rm price-alerts &&  docker container prune -f
scripts.setup-localstack: cdklocal deploy -a "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register dev/environment/setup/localstack/main.ts" --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy-localstack: cdklocal deploy -a "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register dev/main.ts" --all --require-approval never
scripts.delete-localstack: npm run set-local-creds && cdklocal destroy -a "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register dev/main.ts" --force --all
scripts.update-localstack: npm run set-local-creds && npm run delete-localstack && npm run deploy-localstack
scripts.deploy-best-performers: cdklocal deploy LseBestPerformersLambdaStack -a "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register dev/main.ts" --require-approval never --method=direct
scripts.delete-best-performers: cdklocal -a "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register dev/main.ts" destroy LseBestPerformersLambdaStack --force
scripts.update-best-performers: npm run set-local-creds && npm run delete-best-performers && npm run deploy-best-performers
